title: Project Video

embed.description: SEARCHING MEMORY... TARGET // ANALYZE // PROJECT: YI // HOST PROJECT: FIORA // ASSIST PROJECT: LEONA // UNKNOWN PROJECT: LUCIAN // ASSIST PROJECT: YASUO // UNKNOWN PROJECT: ZED // HOSTILE

body: Riot, thanks for that sweet video of the project skins. It literally put chills down my spine watching it. Great Job.

replies.body: Thanks so much! The whole team put in a ton of effort, and it's really rewarding to hear that you enjoyed it. Was there a particular part that you really enjoyed? What do you think we could have done better?

Just the visual of the main game i play with characters ive been using for years now make everything about it awesome. I love the slow buildup to the crazy action and the focus of making certain champs out as just crazy like how zed just goes balistic vs the 3 others. Even tho the videos always seem to come out for the "good side" as the victor its still awesome to watch. I've watch it multiple times because the work is just awesome. I wouldddddd like to see the bad guys win in a video in an obvious fashion, i think that would be cool. But thanks again, Awesome vid.
I gotta say I was severely disappointed that not only did Zed not laugh the whole time he wasn't fighting he didn't even laugh once!

It's a shame you couldn't get leona in!

as for good parts, I really enjoyed the opening part when Fiora was helping Yi out, as well as the action parts with fiora and zed in particular.

great job!

> [{quoted}](name=The5thSin,realm=NA,application-id=EBBIvmVK,discussion-id=liwGXeIa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-11T01:39:59.236+0000)
>
> Thanks so much! The whole team put in a ton of effort, and it's really rewarding to hear that you enjoyed it. Was there a particular part that you really enjoyed?

I really liked how elements of the "programmed blue pill" fantasy world kept trying to override the new reality they've entered.  That was some very done, if subtle, storytelling there.

>What do you think we could have done better?

I really wish you had included more of Leona and Yasuo in the animation.  Two champions, one with the first new skin in over two years, and they're not in the _promotion_ video/commercial?  Really bad marketing decision there.  :/
Mostly on the part on  Lucian vs Zed. It's like, sword fighting duel seems kind of a bore now, but when it comes to making guns vs sword(or blade, w/e) works, it's just truly epic :D
